description: Creates a quick connect for the specified Amazon Connect instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: A unique name of the quick connect.

parameters.name: QuickConnectConfig
parameters.description: Configuration settings for the quick connect. The type of quick connect. In the Amazon Connect admin website, when you create a quick connect, you are prompted to assign one of the following types: Agent (USER), External (PHONE_NUMBER), or Queue (QUEUE). UserConfig (dict) --- The user configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is USER. The identifier of the user. The identifier of the flow. QueueConfig (dict) --- The queue configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is QUEUE. The identifier for the queue. PhoneConfig (dict) --- The phone configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is PHONE_NUMBER. The phone number in E.164 format.

nested_params.name: QuickConnectType
nested_params.description: The type of quick connect. In the Amazon Connect admin website, when you create a quick connect, you are prompted to assign one of the following types: Agent (USER), External (PHONE_NUMBER), or Queue (QUEUE).

nested_params.name: UserConfig
nested_params.description: The user configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is USER.

nested_params.name: QueueConfig
nested_params.description: The queue configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is QUEUE.

nested_params.name: PhoneConfig
nested_params.description: The phone configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is PHONE_NUMBER.

nested_params.name: PhoneNumber
nested_params.description: The phone number in E.164 format.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource. For example, { 'Tags': {'key1':'value1', 'key2':'value2'} }. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: QuickConnectARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the quick connect.

nested_items.name: QuickConnectId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the quick connect.
